title: Why You Treat the God (#2) of the Void at the Foot of your Bed as a Person
description:
Jordan Peterson tells a story of prayer that "works" to Sam Harris and they both agree they don't know where the answer comes from. This is God #2 (after he explained God #1). The "spirit" we must use in times like that is Pascal's "spirit of finesse". This is why psychologically speaking the God who is "holy holy holy" is not treated as impersonal but as a person and we are best to do so. 

Lots of material here from John Vervaeke on Kant and Jung, https://youtu.be/Noc1OH0CUBc

Greg Sadler on Pascal's Pensees https://youtu.be/VSIGf-aAYPM

Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris and Bert Weinstein in Vancouver 1 https://youtu.be/d-Z9EZE8kpo

CS Lewis The Discarded Image https://www.amazon.com/Discarded-Image-Introduction-Renaissance-Literature-ebook/dp/B00DB3FVCK

Owen Barfield Re-discover of Meaning and other Essays https://www.amazon.com/Rediscovery-Meaning-Other-Essays/dp/0956942334/

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discordapp.com/invite/aBhYP9w (Discord Server)

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay


To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://beta.lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
